description: Proposed H3G 3No. Remote Fibre BOB & 3No.Remote DC BOB to be installed. Proposed H3G & EE 3No. ASI4518R42v02 antenna at 23.0m to be installed. Proposed 1No. Local Fibre BOB &1No. Local DC BOB to be installed on proposed BOB ladder within cabin 3 EE. Proposed 3No. Multicore Fibre & 3No. DC cables to be installed. existing cable management to be utilised. Proposed 1No. Yoke bracket c/w 2No. CHS60.3mm, 2.5m long antenna support poles to be installed. Proposed H3G 6No. ACOMD2A05v06 combiners to be installed. Proposed H3G 9No. RRU's to be installed. Proposed 2No. additional support poles to be installed required for existing freestanding frame. Existing H3G & EE 3No. 742215 antennas at 23.0m to be removed. Existing EE 1No. Huawei AOC4518R8v06 antenna at 23.0m to be relocated onto Proposed Yoke bracket. Existing H3G 1No. IFS5906 AC C/W BBU5900 to be refreshed & re-used for proposed upgrade within cabin 3 EE. Existing H3G & EE 6No. LDF7-50 Feeders & 3No. hybrid cables to be re-used and associated ancillary works
